name: over-db
author: Dara Dermody
description: Web application that allows people to easily follow their favourite cast and crew in movies

scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c green,cyan 'yarn workspace @overdb/frontend dev' 'yarn workspace @overdb/backend dev'
scripts.deploy: sudo systemctl stop overdb.service && sudo cp build/overdb /usr/local/bin/overdb && sudo systemctl restart overdb.service
